verses.verse: Now when <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H6419>praying<s%>, the <S%H784>fire<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H398>consumed<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%>; and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%>.

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2076>offered<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H2076>offered<s%> a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, and an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%>: so the <S%H4428>king<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2596>dedicated<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

Also at the same <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6213>kept<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with <S%H3966>him<s%>, a very <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6951>congregation<s%>, from the entering <S%H935>in<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> unto the <S%H5158>river<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And in the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H6213>made<s%> a solemn <S%H6116>assembly<s%>: for they <S%H6213>kept<s%> the <S%H2598>dedication<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, and the <S%H2282>feast<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

And on the <S%H7969>three<s%> and <S%H6242>twentieth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> he <S%H7971>sent<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7971>away<s%> into their <S%H168>tents<s%>, <S%H8056>glad<s%> and <S%H2896>merry<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%> for the <S%H2896>goodness<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6213>showed<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>, and to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, and to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>.

Thus <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H3615>finished<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>: and all that <S%H935>came<s%> into <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>'s <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H6213>make<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and in his own <S%H1004>house<s%>, he successfully <S%H6743>completed<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8085>him<s%>, I have heard your <S%H8605>prayer<s%>, and have <S%H977>chosen<s%> this <S%H4725>place<s%> to myself for a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>.

<S%H2005>If<s%> I shut <S%H6113>up<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> that there be no <S%H4306>rain<s%>, or if I <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H2284>locusts<s%> to <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, or if I <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H1698>pestilence<s%> among my <S%H5971>people<s%>;

If my <S%H5971>people<s%>, which are <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name<s%>, shall <S%H3665>humble<s%> <S%H6419>themselves<s%>, and pray, and <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%>, and <S%H7725>turn<s%> from their <S%H7451>wicked<s%> <S%H1870>ways<s%>; then will I <S%H8085>hear<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and will <S%H5545>forgive<s%> their <S%H2403>sin<s%>, and will <S%H7495>heal<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%>.
Now my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall be <S%H6605>open<s%>, and my <S%H241>ears<s%> <S%H7183>attentive<s%> unto the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> that is made in this <S%H4725>place<s%>.

For now have I <S%H977>chosen<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> this <S%H1004>house<s%>, that my <S%H8034>name<s%> may be there <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>: and my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and my <S%H3820>heart<s%> shall be there <S%H3117>perpetually<s%>.

And as for <S%H3212>you<s%>, if you will walk <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1732>me<s%>, as David your <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all that I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H8104>you<s%>, and shall observe my <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and my <S%H4941>judgments<s%>;

Then will I <S%H6965>establish<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of your <S%H4438>kingdom<s%>, according as I have <S%H3772>covenanted<s%> with <S%H1732>David<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, There shall not <S%H3772>fail<s%> you a <S%H376>man<s%> to be <S%H4910>ruler<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

But if you turn <S%H7725>away<s%>, and <S%H5800>forsake<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and my <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, which I have <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1980>you<s%>, and shall go and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and worship <S%H7812>them<s%>;

Then will I pluck them up by the <S%H5428>roots<s%> out of my <S%H127>land<s%> which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H1004>them<s%>; and this house, which I have <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> for my <S%H8034>name<s%>, will I cast <S%H7993>out<s%> of my <S%H6440>sight<s%>, and will <S%H5414>make<s%> it to be a <S%H4912>proverb<s%> and a <S%H8148>byword<s%> among all <S%H5971>nations<s%>.
